Who we are

We are in the business of manufacturing Two-wheeler, Automotive, UPS, and Tubular batteries and have been in existence for more than four decades in batteries industry. We are a group of companies engaged in the manufacturing/trading of batteries and battery components. SOLANCE is the latest feather in our crown with a complete range of VRLA batteries and initial installed capacity of producing over 3M batteries P.A

Learn More Contact Us

CONSUMER BATTERY SOLUTION

Based on our many years of experience and expertise, we will revolutionize battery industry

Why Choose Us

Our Goal

Nothing can be more important than customer satisfaction. Happy customers brings a joy to us

Production Technologies

We use engineering and manufacturing technology to make production faster, simpler and more efficient

Quality

To ensure the safety and optimal performance of Solance Products, we put them through a rigorous quality

Training and Development

For better working experience, we regularly conduct various training & development programs

Product Features

Top Quality

All Solance batteries pass through vigorous tests before reaching the customers. We are proud to say that any battery that passes through our quality check is best in class in the industries.

Zero Maintenancey

Our batteries are completely maintenance-free. Solance batteries have the advantage of being guaranteed for life!

Long Life

With the help of advanced technologies and machinery Lifecycle of Solance batteries is long lasting with excellent performance.
